item.title: The case of 19 year old Alexee Trevizo
item.description: This is the case of 19 year old Alexee Trevizo & how she went to the hospital complaining of back pain… but ended up getting charged with m*rd3r…

item.title: A Breakup That Turned Into a Tragedy
item.description: A look at a case where a young woman tried to walk away from a relationship, only for the situation to take a devastating turn. This piece explores the lead‑up, the investigation, and the broader conversations it sparked about safety, warning signs, and the importance of taking threats seriously.

media:content.media:title: A Breakup That Turned Into a Tragedy
media:content.media:description: A look at a case where a young woman tried to walk away from a relationship, only for the situation to take a devastating turn. This piece explores the lead‑up, the investigation, and the broader conversations it sparked about safety, warning signs, and the importance of taking threats seriously.

item.title: A Final Message That Raised More Questions Than Answers
item.description: An overview of the Ana María Serrano case, focusing on the events leading up to her disappearance and the unsettling warning she shared beforehand. This segment walks through the timeline, the investigation, and the public reaction, highlighting how one message became a key part of understanding what happened.
